title: Kayle and Morgana Rework

replies.body:
tbh they are probably putting it off until they balance the insane changes they are making to all skills/runes/items.

I'm holding a 95-94% WIn rate with Morgana right now, so I'm in no huge hurry :S

> [{quoted}](name=Illabethe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vsYYN0AE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-02-13T01:48:57.656+0000)
>
> tbh they are probably putting it off until they balance the insane changes they are making to all skills/runes/items.
> 
> I'm holding a 95-94% WIn rate with Morgana right now, so I'm in no huge hurry :S

mind casually joining Morgana mains (the discord) and pinging the dude with Morningstar in his name? Imma need you to teach me whatever you are doing for a 90+% winrate!
He's a bronze 1 player with silver skill with not that many games.

I'm a BI after season start player who historically gravitates to High Silver/Low gold on my _**smurf **_

My main is DII Season 8/7 DI Season 6, and I have 3 Perma banned accounts which consisted of Season 3-4 Plat I, Season 4-5 Plat II, Season 5 - 7 Gold I (Smurf).

The only reason this account isn't already Gold this season is because I've been Queuing "Fill" rather than a single role. I went 70% Win rate on my first 65 games. 65 games took me up ONE tier from B II to B I after placements in 70% (Granted 37 of those games were placements to unlock roles, so only 28 went toward actual rank progress).

I'm also waiting on one of my friends to get his computer replaced, because he's having trouble where every game is popping up 7-8 Bugsplats as soon as he starts playing. Kind of annoying to duo queue when your partner is making every game a 4v5.


P.S. Not that many games? lmfao. Last season alone this account had 1800+ games. I'm at something like 85 already.

My main account had 1972 games last year. Lolwut?

Im talking about this season, you being Bronze after having 22 games with Morgana kind of doesn't supoort the notion that you're that good since with that winrate you'd already be skipping divisions, not only in your placement games, but even now.

You didn't read a thing I wrote. Fill works differently this season than One role. I Queue Fill, which takes 4-5 times as many games to climb.

This account ended Season 8 Silver II/III. It started placements in B III because of the new system. Winning 6 or 7 of each placements set only raises you to about B I or II just shy of I.

This season's placements don't have explosive growth beyond where you were. You gained 50-34 LP, depending on how difficult the teams were, and there are only 8 games, instead of 10.

I had 70% Win rate in my first 65-70 games. In any other season, that'd be B II to Gold IV. But this is split season, and all games do not work toward one rank. Playing 90 games = the equiv of playing 18 games per role.

I know how it works, but the fact that you ended up in bronze as someone who claims to have been DII previously after more than 10 games doesn't make sense: the bug that placed everyone in Iron was fixed, anyways.

If you look at my op.gg, most of the games I played this season I trolled or was trolled. I've had maybe 2-3 serious games. Still, after having lost so much, I still ended in Gold II, like a tier below my peak. You on the other hand, have a mediocre KDA and are, instead of being in the top 1.5% or so, in the top 70%.

Now, for your growth. Your growth may be that large because you simply don't have skill. This is supported by the fact that your level is high enough to suggest you actually play this game as much as if you were streaming, yet your rank is really, really bad. I started placements in G4, and still had more growth than you seemed to have in bronze. That would suggest that the difference between my real rank and the one I was placed in initially, and your respective set of ranks are vastly different.

Finally, I play fill as well. But like every sane person knows, fill doesn't equate to equal percentage for getting any role. Most of the time it's primarily support and depending on the meta, top or bottom.

Despite all this, I could literally be wrong about everything said after my initial comment, which is unlikely, but I'd still be right about the cause of your winate - trash rank, low amount of games played.

It's called different accounts. The D II account is currently Plat I.

That means you didn't read the fact this is a smurf :S.
A smurf that's almost level 200 ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤”
Full crit morgana to the win!

> I'm holding a 95-94% WIn rate with Morgana right now

hahahahahaha no.

I was 95% when I posted this. I have lost 2 since then, in Promotion matches where I was the only person on my team not feeding/trying to /FF by 5 minutes into the game. The champs they were feeding were Morgana Anathema, like a Lee Sin/Akali duo going 10/0 in 5 minutes to an int feeding Yasuo, or Camille top int feeding an Irelia. I'm still 88%.

> [{quoted}](name=Illabethe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vsYYN0AE,comment-id=000300030000,timestamp=2019-02-14T20:59:07.659+0000)
>
> I was 95% when I posted this. I have lost 2 since then, in Promotion matches where I was the only person on my team not feeding/trying to /FF by 5 minutes into the game. The champs they were feeding were Morgana Anathema, like a Lee Sin/Akali duo going 10/0 in 5 minutes to an int feeding Yasuo, or Camille top int feeding an Irelia. I'm still 88%.

I checked out your profile when you made the comment, and you don't nearly have enough games to justify that win rate.  Beginning of season win rates are always skewed.  Once you have a real good amount of games on that champ then you can go around bragging about win rate.  As of right now out of your season 9 41 Morgana ranked matches you average a 71%.  Not bad but nowhere near 95%.

I had 95% in 20 games . But since then, and 2 chat restrictions later (I firmly believe chat restriction/honor loss results in lower potential teams; after you get one you always lose more games), I've pretty much got Master smurfs, or just absolute uncarryables. Like people end 30 min games with 5500 gold uncarryable. Also had one of my duos literally troll 2 games, first claiming bugsplat and pretty much nonexisting, and then two days ago trolling mid game with an "emergency work call."

Fun times.....
when have they ever put off a champ release because of what the balance day to day team is doing? like, never?
or just waiting because sylas was just released. theyâ€™ll probably reveal and release them in 9.5 and 9.6
Why rework Morgana? What's wrong with her current kit that warrants a change?

> [{quoted}](name=Lovelle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vsYYN0AE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-02-13T03:59:28.492+0000)
>
> Why rework Morgana? What's wrong with her current kit that warrants a change?

She is an overall older champion, but its intended mainly for her sister "Kayle" {{champion:10}} who has been quite a mess throughout the years on league, but since their lore/story is so tightly knit together they decided that if they reworked one, they would rework the other. 

Morganas rework apparently won't change her game play too much, but its mainly a visual update, with some possible changes to her W (and I believe passive but not too sure)

With Kayles rework, its going too be brand new abilities, brand new visuals, like a lot of the other reworks this year.

Morgana's rework will probably look similar's to Ezreal where not much changed but his visuals.

> [{quoted}](name=wÃ­tÃ§h,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vsYYN0AE,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2019-02-13T13:12:50.279+0000)
>
> Morgana's rework will probably look similar's to Ezreal where not much changed but his visuals.

His W and E changes are quite a bit different, plus his personality is horrible now. Let's hope they don't go down that route. :P

His E is identical, only his W changed.

Later his ult too but that was more just a straight buff and it is functionally identical.

And his personality is the same cocky attitude with awkward crush on Lux.

> [{quoted}](name=Lovelle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vsYYN0AE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-02-13T03:59:28.492+0000)
>
> Why rework Morgana? What's wrong with her current kit that warrants a change?

It is not wrong, but it is unrewarding and isnt too compatible with the meta and the current passive is a butchered version of her changed passive. It has the same problems the old passive had. The ultimate has a 0.5s casting time and a 3s channel before stunning which is a lot of time to run away or kill morgana, they want to make it more rewarding to use a good one. Compare the safety of a morgana flash ulting with a neeko flash ulting and you will probably see which one falls considerably short ;)
Also, visual changes and simply the Kayle rework being bound to be done at the same time.

> [{quoted}](name=Lovelle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vsYYN0AE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-02-13T03:59:28.492+0000)
>
> Why rework Morgana? What's wrong with her current kit that warrants a change?

Very bland gameplay especially her W. She's only getting minor updates to her kit.
im tired of waiting too, they said the champion roadmap would be released early this year, its february '-'

I think they already released the roadmap. 

Oh no, it was just a dev video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J0X83lIeez4

They still don't mention much, but they basically say what they would in a champion roadmap. Something is better than nothing, and I'm assuming the roadmap will come closer if not simultaneous to Morg/Kayle PBE announcement stuff.
No that was the roadmap.  They did it in video form.

> [{quoted}](name=Jenivie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vsYYN0AE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-12T23:28:57.553+0000)
>
> im tired of waiting too, they said the champion roadmap would be released early this year, its february '-'

Which is still early. Expect it late February to early March.

> [{quoted}](name=Jenivie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vsYYN0AE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-12T23:28:57.553+0000)

> im tired of waiting too, they said the champion roadmap would be released early this year, its february '-'



I was thinking it was gonna be late December/early January the latest but then sylas was announced :(

Bland gameplay?

{{champion:86}}: Forgot about me?

are you saying spining is bland?

how dare you {{sticker:darius-angry}}
The only reason I wish these reworks don't come out is so Kamra doesn't get her trash rework they have planned, but I agree it has been awhile.

I completely forgot about that...... I think _some_ of it is a good idea, but a lot of the planned karma rework looks messy

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

Idk I think it is a total disaster. It doesn't accomplish any of the goals that were set out for it. It also adds an extremely niche mechanic that is entirely support oriented which will cause her to be balanced around the allies that abuse it making her extremely sub par with anyone else and it practically makes Karma go from a 90% support pick to 100% a support pick which is the opposite of what Karma players want. They want her to be more flexed than she already is since it is so little.

> [{quoted}](name=Frosted Tips,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vsYYN0AE,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-02-13T01:44:21.902+0000)

They want her to be more flexed than she already is since it is so little.

Okay but. 
Karma Jg
VGUs are totally separate from when the design team changes a few spells, and anyway they iceboxed the karma work they were doing
2 people downvoted this?

Bulli goat  }: )

(maybe they're worried about how reworks are so Russian Roulette?)
You main morgana now, so I'll warn you to enjoy playing her now. The champ you get will **not** be the same.
Supposedly morg is only getting light touches while kayle is the one getting the overhaul.

Im so confused.. can u tell me whats it ??
This Morgana update is poop, she looks super awfull, its doesnt still morgana whos know..
Dress is totally mess, and why they did to her skins
August posted this [message](https://mobile.twitter.com/RiotAugust/status/1096325102159912960) today so pretty sure the big reveal is next week in 9.5

MORDEKAISER HUEHUEHUEHUEHUEHUEHUEHUEHUEHUUHEUHEUEHUEHUEH

You better wait ur turn, fool
Morde is later.
Probably soon? I'd guess 9.4 but 9.4-9.7 is the most likely dates.
I think you mean 9.5 - 9.7 since 9.4 is wrapped up {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Correct me if i'm wrong, but Morgana's rework should be much lighter than Kayle's rework, correct? Kayle becoming more like a support, and... Not sure about Morg, probably still mid/support. That being said, i'm excite.

Yes, Morgs is just a touch up (mainly a visual update) and Kayle is a full overhaul, where she has been confirmed to begin as a melee fighter and become a ranged powerhouse. So I don't think that's becoming more of a support, as she is meant ro be a solo laner. She will still have utility of heals and shielding though.

Morgana rework? She is already played at a very high tier why would you rework something that is working?

Kayle I really could care less what you do with him, including deleting him.

>Kayle I really could care less what you do with him, including deleting him.

Kayle is a her....
I just cannot wait for the announcement of a Golden Chroma for my Silver Kayle skin.
